#include <stdio.h>
#include <iostream>
using namespace std;

void sum(int a, int b)
{
    //Puts a in array and multiply it b times with itself
    int array[2001];
    int m = 0;
    array[0] = 1;
    int aux = a;
    int i = 0;
    while(a > 0)
    {
        array[i] = a%10;
        a /= 10;
        m++;
        i++;
    }

    for(int exp = 1; exp < b; exp++)
    {

        int temp = 0;
        for(int k = 0; k < m; k++)
        {
            int x = array[k]*aux+temp;
            array[k] = x%10;
            temp = x/10;
            //m++;
        }

        while(temp > 0)
        {
            array[m] = temp%10;
            temp /= 10;
            m++;
        }


        if(exp == b-1)
        {for(int x = m-1; x >= 0; x--)
        {
            cout << array[x];
        }
        cout << endl;
        int ans = 0;
        for(int x = m-1; x >= 0; x--)
        {
            ans += array[x];
        }
        cout << ans << endl;}
    }
}

int main()
{
    int base, exp;
    scanf("%d %d", &base, &exp);
    sum(base,exp);
    return 0;
}
